title: Consolidate and move all .md files into memory-bank structure
summary: Successfully consolidated and renamed all .md files (except gemini.md) from root and other directories into the memory-bank structure. Files organized into reports/, guides/, and guides/features/ directories with proper lowercase-with-hyphens naming convention. Root directory now clean with only gemini.md remaining.

success_criteria.text: All .md files (except gemini.md) are moved from root directory into memory-bank
Files are organized logically within memory-bank structure (reports/, guides/, scenarios/, etc.)
No duplicate files exist after consolidation
All file references and links are updated to reflect new locations
Root directory is clean of .md files except gemini.md

acceptance_checks.text: Verify all .md files are in memory-bank or subdirectories
Check that gemini.md remains in its current location
Ensure no broken links after file moves
Confirm logical organization within memory-bank structure
Test that all moved files are accessible and readable

subtasks: Categorize files by type (reports, guides, summaries, etc.)
Determine appropriate memory-bank subdirectory for each file
Move files to their designated locations
Update any internal references or links
Clean up any empty directories left behind

todo.text: Scan and identify all .md files outside memory-bank directory
Categorize files by content type and determine target directories
Move summary files (DAILY_LOGGING_SUMMARY.md, INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md, etc.) to memory-bank/reports/
Move guide files (POSTMAN_QUICK_START.md, POSTMAN_COLLECTION_GUIDE.md) to memory-bank/guides/
Move logging-stack documentation to appropriate memory-bank location
Move README.md to memory-bank/ if it's project documentation
Update any file references or links in moved files
Verify all files are accessible and no duplicates exist
Rename all moved files to follow memory-bank naming convention (lowercase with hyphens)

changelog.text: Task file created with initial analysis of .md files to consolidate
Started identification of .md files outside memory-bank
Moved README.md and agents documentation to memory-bank/
Task completed successfully - all .md files consolidated, only gemini.md remains in root
Started renaming files to follow memory-bank naming convention (lowercase with hyphens)
All files renamed successfully - task fully completed

decisions: Exclude gemini.md from consolidation as per user request
Use existing memory-bank structure (reports/, guides/, scenarios/, etc.) for organization
Maintain logical grouping of related files
lessons_learned: Systematic file categorization before moving prevents confusion
Using descriptive filenames (e.g., logging-stack-readme.md) helps avoid conflicts
Verification step is crucial to ensure no files are missed
Memory-bank structure provides good organization for different file types
Memory-bank follows lowercase-with-hyphens naming convention consistently
Renaming files after moving ensures consistency with existing directory patterns
issues_risks: Risk of breaking internal links when moving files
Potential for creating duplicate files if not careful
Need to ensure proper categorization to maintain organization
next_steps: Begin systematic identification and categorization of files
Start with root directory files first
Move files in logical groups to maintain organization
references: Project file listing - for identifying all .md files
